QuestData.Title: The Soulcutter
QuestData.Description: Don't look at me! Who do you think you are?$B$BYou and I are on the same side, you know. The necromancers here, we have to kill them. All of them.$B$BDon't you agree?$B$BOf course you do, and you can help me accomplish this goal. Find a Soulsever Blade in that hovel where the necromancers have holed up like rats. It has... special properties... that will aid us against the undead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Soulsever Blade from Auchindoun.
